title: Boxplot of Teenager Weights
question_text: A doctor measured the weights (in kg) of teenagers and constructed a boxplot of the data, shown below. Created for Albert.io. Copyright 2017. All rights reserved. What could be the potential reason(s) that the graph does not accurately represent the data? I. The data could be bimodal, which the graph would not correctly show. II. It is unclear if there is only one data value at $95\text{ kg}$ or many values near $95\text{ kg}$ . III. It is unclear what the center is in this graphical display.
